author: fwyzard
body:
#### PR description:

Use `alpaka::allocBuf` instead of `alpaka::allocAsyncBuf` for blocking CPU queues.


#### PR validation:

See the discussion at #50194.

Impact on the 2025 HLT timing is in line with expectations:
  - CPU-only timing is reduced by ~3%;
  - GPU-enabled timing is unaffected.

See [below](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/50205#issuecomment-3937314184) for more details on the (positive) impact on the HLT performance.


#### Backport status

Backport of #50194 to 16.0.x for data taking and MC production.
title: Use alpaka::allocBuf for blocking CPU queues [16.0.x]
